      • dataSource

        public DataSource dataSource()
        Get the DataSource object associated with the only relational database service bound to the app. This is equivalent to the <cloud:data-source/> element.
        Specified by:
        dataSource in interface ServiceConnectionFactory
        Returns:
        data source
        Throws:
        CloudException - if there are either 0 or more than 1 relational database services.

      • dataSource

        public DataSource dataSource(DataSourceConfig dataSourceConfig)
        Get the DataSource object associated with the only relational database service bound to the app configured as specified. This is equivalent to the <cloud:data-source> element with nested <cloud:connection> and/or <cloud:pool> elements.
        Specified by:
        dataSource in interface ServiceConnectionFactory
        Parameters:
        dataSourceConfig - configuration for the data source created
        Returns:
        data source
        Throws:
        CloudException - if there are either 0 or more than 1 relational database services.

      • dataSource

        public DataSource dataSource(String serviceId)
        Get the DataSource object for the specified relational database service. This is equivalent to the <cloud:data-source service-id="serviceId"/>
        Specified by:
        dataSource in interface ServiceConnectionFactory
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the name of the service
        Returns:
        data source
        Throws:
        CloudException - if the specified service doesn't exist

      • service

        public Object service()
        Get the service connector object associated with the only service bound to the app. This is equivalent to the <cloud:service/> element.
        Specified by:
        service in interface ServiceConnectionFactory
        Returns:
        service connector object
        Throws:
        CloudException - if there are either 0 or more than 1 services.

      • service

        public <T> T service(Class<T> serviceConnectorType)
        Get the service connector object of the specified type if there is only one such candidate service This is equivalent to the <cloud:service connector-type="T.class"/> element.
        Specified by:
        service in interface ServiceConnectionFactory
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the service connector to be returned
        Parameters:
        serviceConnectorType - the class of the service connector to be returned
        Returns:
        service connector object
        Throws:
        CloudException - if there are either 0 or more than 1 candidate services.

      • service

        public Object service(String serviceId)
        Get the service connector object for the specified service. This is equivalent to the <cloud:service service-id="serviceId"/> element.
        Specified by:
        service in interface ServiceConnectionFactory
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the service ID of the service to be returned
        Returns:
        service connector object
        Throws:
        CloudException - if the specified service doesn't exist

      • service

        public <T> T service(String serviceId,
                     Class<T> serviceConnectorType)
        Get the service connector object of the specified type and service ID This is equivalent to the <cloud:service service-id="serviceId" connector-type="T.class"/> element.
        Specified by:
        service in interface ServiceConnectionFactory
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the service connector to be returned
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the service ID of the service to be returned
        serviceConnectorType - the class of the service connector to be returned
        Returns:
        service connector object
        Throws:
        CloudException - if the specified service doesn't exist
